content: wrap up in the warmth and nostalgia of this funky crochet cardigan featuring red heart all in one granny square learn granny stitch granny square and flat slip_stitch seaming while the yarn expertly changes colors for you to create perfect 6 squares simply join the granny squares and this garment becomes a patchwork of memories a true blend of comfort creativity and timeless style sizes xs/s/m l/xl/2xl 3/4/5xl to fit chest measurement 28-38 40-48 50-62 / 74-96 5 101 5-122 127-157 5 cm red heart all in one granny square 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m 2040 black-amber moss mc - 2 3 4 balls 2041 black-scarlet sands a - 1 1 1 ball yardage 1251-2085 red heart super saver 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m 0312 black b - 1 1 1 ball crochet hook size us i/9 5 5mm gauge motif = approximately 6 / 15cm square
